title: Willing to Endure
description: A Reluctant Villain Fights a Dark GodOn a quest for vengeance, one warrior travels beyond the reach of kings and emperors, but the demons of the Nine Hells are impossible to escape. Armies of barbarians and animal men march to war, and old horrors hide at the edges of the world.Seeking vengeance or a heroic death, Tyrus of Kelnor wanders a strange land teeming with barbarians, giants, and animal men. With his unnatural fighting skills he earns new infamy among men and monsters alike, but his plans for vengeance falter as he struggles to find a home. He dreams of a little girl who needs his help and discovers old horrors from before the Age of Chaos. The barbarians worship a dark god who has his own plans for revenge.
author: Burke Fitzpatrick
